message: So lately, like well for awhile now I've been secretly collecting and noting how people have been using video on the web to pitch ideas and concepts.  Specifically the audience of folks trying to raise money for a project or startup, or by internet companies themselves, Google, etc.  I find many of these videos give me ideas on how we could create better video storyboards or reels for projects.  Video inspiration goes here.  Google really strives to make either animated stories or real people real context like stories.  Kickstarter is another great place to see good examples of current video communication trends as they are all attempting to get money for projects.
